name: Duotron (Pir0_C0mder)
description:
How to play : 
Thanks for playing Duotron. Duotron was made for Global Game Jam 2022 by IIT ROORKEE STUDENTS Open it on a desktop : Collaborators : Ishan Singh Saiyam Arora Amrit Prakash Abhay Kumar Bhorayat Vaibhav Jindal

This game is made by absolute noobs in just two days don't judge it's quality .

Github Repository : Amritprakash2704/Duotron: Bunch of first year students trying to feed their crave for game development (github.com)
